exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 3 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_maxi A x)

Premises:
Inductive Map (A : Type) : Type := M0 : Map A | M1 : ad -> A -> Map A | M2 : Map A -> Map A -> Map A For Map: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M0: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _]
ensemble_base : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool -> Prop
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted
map_maxi : forall A : Set, Map A -> Map bool
map_mini_appartient : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), ensemble_base A x (map_mini A x)
non_dist_concat_s : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) x)
prechain_sum : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), (exists x : Map A, p = single A x) \/ (exists (x : Map A) (y : prechain A), p = concat A y x)
chain_single : forall (A : Set) (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x)
dist_chain_ind : forall (A : Set) (P : prechain A -> Prop), (forall x : Map A, P (single A x)) -> (forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> P (concat A (single A x) y)) -> (forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> P (concat A z x) -> P (concat A (concat A z x) y)) -> forall p : prechain A, dist_chain A p -> P p
chain_concat_m : forall (A : Set) (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T y -> r x y -> chain A T r (concat A z x) -> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y)
iteres_increasing_chain : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> increasing_app A r f -> r x (f x) -> chain A T r (iteres A f x n)
Inductive non_dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := non_dist_concat_s : forall x : Map A, non_dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_hd : forall (x : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) x) | non_dist_concat_m_tl : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), non_dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> non_dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For non_dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For non_dist_concat_m_hd: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For non_dist_concat_m_tl: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _]
iteres_eq_0 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), prechain_last A (iteres A f x n) = power (Map A) f x n
iteres_length : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), chain_length A (iteres A f x n) = S n
Inductive dist_chain (A : Set) : prechain A -> Prop := dist_single : forall x : Map A, dist_chain A (single A x) | dist_concat_s : forall x y : Map A, x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A (single A x) y) | dist_concat_m : forall (x y : Map A) (z : prechain A), x <> y -> dist_chain A (concat A z x) -> dist_chain A (concat A (concat A z x) y) For dist_chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For dist_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For dist_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
iteres_non_sas_chain : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n m : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> increasing_app A r f -> r x (f x) -> bounded_sas_chain A T r m -> m <= n -> chain A T r (iteres A f x n) /\ ~ dist_chain A (iteres A f x n)
iteres_non_sas_chain_fp_2 : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n m : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> increasing_app A r f -> r x (f x) -> bounded_sas_chain A T r m -> m <= n -> fix_point A T f (power (Map A) f x n)
Inductive chain (A : Set) : mEnsemble A -> mRelation A -> prechain A -> Prop := chain_single : forall (x : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> chain A T r (single A x) | chain_concat_s : forall (x y : Map A) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A), T x -> T y -> r x y ->...-> chain A T r (concat A (concat A z x) y) For chain: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _] For chain_single: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_s: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _] For chain_concat_m: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _]
iteres_ult_const_4 : forall (A : Set) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n : nat), non_dist_chain A (iteres A f x n) -> exists p : nat, S p <= n /\ power (Map A) f x p = power (Map A) f x (S p)
iteres_non_sas_chain_fp_0 : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (r : mRelation A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n m : nat), T x -> def_ok_app A T f -> increasing_app A r f -> r x (f x) -> bounded_sas_chain A T r m -> m <= n -> exists p : nat, S p <= n /\ power (Map A) f x p = power (Map A) f x (S p)
iteres_def_ok : forall (A : Set) (T : mEnsemble A) (f : Map A -> Map A) (x : Map A) (n k : nat), def_ok_app A T f -> T (power (Map A) f x n) -> T (power (Map A) f x (n + k))
pair_sp : forall (B C : Type) (x : B * C), x = (fst x, snd x)
dist_compl : forall (A : Set) (p : prechain A), ~ dist_chain A p < -> non_dist_chain A p
sigT_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (P0 : {x : A & P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (existT P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A & P x}, P0 s
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
alist_of_Map_sorts1 : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), alist_sorted_1 A (alist_of_Map A m)
MapDomRestrTo_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap A (MapDomRestrTo A A m m) m
Map_of_alist_of_Map : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap A (Map_of_alist A (alist_of_Map A m)) m
alist_of_Map_semantics : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqm A (MapGet A m) (alist_semantics A (alist_of_Map A m))
MapDomRestrBy_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall m' : Map B, mapcanon A (MapDomRestrBy A B m m')
MapDomRestrTo_canon : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall m' : Map B, mapcanon A (MapDomRestrTo A B m m')
MapRemove_canon : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), mapcanon A m -> forall a : ad, mapcanon A (MapRemove A m a)
MapMerge_idempotent : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), eqmap A (MapMerge A m m) m
alist_of_Map_sorts : forall (A : Type) (m : Map A), alist_sorted A (alist_of_Map A m) = true

```coq
Proof.
  intros A x.
  induction x as [|a x IHx].
  - simpl. auto.
  - simpl. apply ensemble_base with (m := map_maxi A x); auto.
Qed.```

original: intros A x. induction x as [|a x IHx]. - simpl. auto. - simpl. apply ensemble_base with (m := map_maxi A x); auto.
